amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to submit to Congress a report on the impact of H.R. 1213 on the possible delays and potential enrollment reductions to Health Benefit Exchanges.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-70 to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to submit to Congress a report on the impact of H.R. 1213 on the possible delays and potential enrollment reductions to Health Benefit Exchanges.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 242 (Roll no. 283).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 242 (Roll no. 283).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Ellison.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
